ARTICLE1.P1: Internationalized and accessible components for everyone. Well tested to ensure performance and reliability.
ARTICLE1.P2: Straightforward APIs with consistent cross platform behaviour.

ARTICLE2.P1: Provide tools that help developers build their own custom components with common interaction patterns.
ARTICLE2.P2: Customizable within the bounds of the Material Design specification.

ARTICLE3.P1: Built by the Angular team to integrate seamlessly with Angular.
ARTICLE3.P2: Start from scratch or drop into your existing applications.
